Maid of the Field020734nkjcphb409ohvypdhlcahngtbr7lzjo1480992014-06-23T18:29:08ZGreater good3347453[[File:Prince_and_Maids.png|thumb|A Prince of Pentos beds the Maids of the Field and Seas]]{{Quote|On the New Year, to bring good fortune to Pentos, this Prince must deflower the Maid of the Field and the Maid of the Seas. I confess I donâ€™t know how each is chosen, or what becomes of them after serving their purpose.|Ser [[Jorah Mormont]]|The Free Cities (Histories & Lore)}}
'''Maid of the Field''' is the title given to one of the two maidens that, by tradition, the [[Prince of Pentos|Prince]] of [[Pentos]] must deflower each new year to bring good fortune to the [[Pentos|city]]. The other maid is known as the [[Maid of the Seas]].<ref>"[[The Free Cities (Histories & Lore)]]"</ref>
